name: Blossom (Paradel Studios)
description:
Game Overview

Title : Blossom

Genre : 2D Runner

Platform : PC

Game Engine : Unity5

Pitch

Our hero, a young carnivorous plant, was given the power to run by the Creator, "Plant Jesus". The plant then found the cursed artifacts, the box and the spring, which aroused the anger of the Ancient Gods. Throughout its journey, this frail plant will meet them and make a hard choice : to save them, or to undo them.
